data.text: @KyleTux @JJWatt @Eminem I just want to see what happens. No one has even thought about dissing him on that scale in years
@KyleTux @JJWatt You have a point but the whole thing is irrelevant to me right now my only social media concern right now is @Eminem ‘s response

@KyleTux I just think that @JJWatt was a little bit more deserving of it being that he raised 18 million dollars for the hurricane Harvey victims. Nike knew the controversy that it would cause putting kapernick as the face of it
@KyleTux “But he doesn’t play in the league anymore” https://t.co/2OWCWaEULh
